title: Pony Express National Historic Trail: Garden Pass
body: Garden Pass       Garden Pass is in Eureka County, Nevada. Check out a section of the Pony Express Trail on Bureau of Land Management lands where you can ride, hike, or drive part of the original route.          Rugged Men, Rigorous RidesRead about the men who rode the ponies and about five Pony Express station sites that you can visit today! (1.65 MB pdf)         The Crowd Cheered On . . .Find out how the Pony Express came to be and why its existence was short lived. (548 KB pdf)
